name: The Annoying Button (Unity Prototype)
description:
This is simply a recreation of the original "The Annoying Button" I created in Game Maker Studio 2.

The project may be private but you'll get a little bit of how it was like in this prototype.

The reason I release this is that I plan to probably remake it but with additional content, etc. Its a pretty quick game though, this version that is. The longest parts would be the clicking.

Its all just a bunch of nonsense, can you out-annoy the button?

Have fun, there is currently no available source code.

Want more information? Just keep clicking and clicking and clicking, you'll get your answers, maybe.
